section.title: Overview
section.p: Bob has an iPhone with no existing internet plan. He contacts an operator to buy an internet bundle from anywhere, for example, home or any public places, such as coffee shop or restaurant for a limited duration of time.

High speed usage limit is applied on the internet data bundle and the bundle subscription expires within one hour from purchase. When subscribed to the internet data bundle, the iPhone consumes data at a defined rate. If the data consumption from the internet bundle reaches the cap limit before an hour expires, then internet services are continued at a reduced speed. When the internet bundle subscription expires after an hour, iPhone can no longer access the internet bundle.

ul.li: Bob has an iPhone with no existing internet services.
Bob contacts an operator to request an internet bundle for a limited duration of one hour.

The iPhone consumes 250 MB of data at a QoS of 1 MB/sec. If the data consumption the cap limit before an hour expires, then the internet services continue but the QoS is reduced to 100 Kb/sec. On reaching the cap limit, a notification is sent to Bob over mail.
When the subscription lifecycle expires after an hour, the iPhone can no longer access the internet bundle.

section.title: Provisioning

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

section.p:
Following entities are required for this use case: Entities for case 14
Entity Task
Notification preferences Select the notification channel as email.
Notification template Create a notification template (NT_ShortAccess_1) and include the text to be sent to the end users.
Notification server Configure a notification server to send an email notification.
Thresholds
Create a threshold profile group (TPG_Access_1) and define actions to send SNRs based on the following threshold values:
Threshold 1 value is 0, action is Send-SNR with SL=HIGH
Threshold 2 value is 250 MB, actions are to Send-SNR with SL=LOW and Send-Notification
Charging service Create a charging service (CS_Short_Access_1) with a counter (STA-Counter) and associate it with the threshold profile group and tariff. (TPG_Access_1)
Bundle Create a bundle and associate it with hourly subscription lifecycle.
Lifecycles Create a subscription, device, account, lifecycle. (HourlySubscLC)
Device Create a device (iPhone) and associate it with device lifecycle. (DeviceLifeCycle)
User Create a user (Bob) and associate it with device.
Account Create an account and associate it with account lifecycle. (AccountLifeCycle)
